ygData.subject: Re: Our class
ygData.msgSnippet: Verant has done a variety of thinks to make +PvP players lives harder. Loot bug springs instantly to mind. ... From: Edward Clint  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Verant has done a variety of thinks to make +PvP players' lives harder.
Loot bug springs instantly to mind.
----- Original Message -----
From: Edward Clint <sate@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, April 21, 1999 10:30 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Our class


> From: "Edward Clint" <sate@...>
>
> Queston:
>
> First of all as a PK Wizard I protest the inability of a PK wiz to cast
bind
> on a nPK person who is in your party(exactly whats the reasoning here
> anyway?)
>
> long those lines I wonder, when I am Level 29 or whatever and get
> group-teleport spells.. Can I actually teleport my group? Even if they are
> nPK and I am PK? After finding out about bind, its clear theres little
logic
> here other than making a PKs life harder for no obvious reason.
>
> -Sate
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
> To: Wizard Mailing List <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 2:18 PM
> Subject: [eq_wizards] Our class
>
>
> >From: Karl Hatteland <karlh@...>
> >
> >Sorry, I meant at lvl 29 you get your first group teleport. :)
> >On lvl 34 you get group teleport to the plane of hate
> >
> >
> >------------------------------------------------------------------------
> >Looking to expand your world?

> >ONElist has over 115,000 e-mail communities from which to chose!
> >
>
